Carlos Gilberto Mendes (a mụrụ na 3 Mee 1966) bụ onye Mozambican na-eme ihe nkiri na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị.
A mụrụ Mendes na Maputo n'afọ 1966
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 1977, ọ mebiri ihe ndekọ mbụ ya nke igwu mmiri ma bụrụ onye otu egwuregwu mba Mozambik ruo ọtụtụ afọ.
N'afọ 1985, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi na ihe nkiri mbụ Mozambican, nke akpọrọ O Vento Sopra do Norte, nke José Cardoso duziri ma National Film Institute mepụtara
Ihe nkiri ahụ na-akọ akụkọ banyere agha nnwere onwe nke Mozambique nke metụtara ndị agha nnupụisi nke Frelimo na ndị agha Portuguese. N'afọ 1988, ọ sonyeere otu ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Mutumbela Gogo

Mendes sonyere n'egwuregwu Nove Horas mgbe onye na-eme ihe nkiri nwere ọnyá ma tụbọọ, ahụmahụ nke mere ka ọ na-echegbu onwe ya. Mendes pụtara na ihe nkiri afọ 1991 A Child from the South, nke Sergio Resende duziri. N'afọ 1992, ọ hapụrụ Mutumbela Gogo wee nweta ụlọ ihe nkiri Matchedje (1000 oche) na Estúdio 222 (222 oche), yana ịmepụta ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri nke ya, Gungu
A gbahapụrụ ụlọ ihe nkiri Matchedje n'oge gara aga ma rụọ ọrụ dịka ụlọ nkwakọba ihe maka ihe ndị e zuru ohi site na Port Maputo.

N'afọ 1995, ọ natara Lusophone Merit Award site na Portuguese-Brazilian Foundation for the Development of the Portuguese Language. N'afọ 1996, Mendes malitere ọrụ afọ iri ya dịka onye na-akwado mmemme telivishọn egwu Fantasia. Site n'afọ 2010 ruo 2014, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye isi oche nke Mozambique Swimming Federation. Na Jenụwarị 2020, a họpụtara Mendes ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ nke State maka egwuregwu.
